description.value:
Frequency once per day

Trigger A creature you are aware of damages you with a melee Strike.

Your wound yawns open, appalling your attacker. The attacker must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] saving throw against your class or spell DC, whichever is higher, or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2} on a critical failure). It can't recover from the sickened condition while it's adjacent to you.
